title: Scallops in Blood-Orange Gastrique with Fennel-Endive Salad
sub_head: Remember when a box of oranges was the most thrilling gift? It still is. Use our guide to varieties and sources to find the best heirloom fruit—the kind you can’t find at the supermarket—picked at its prime.
body: To explore and search through all our recipes, check out the new WSJ Recipes page.
